vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
StandardTokenModified.totalSupply_ (StandardTokenModified.sol#92) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (StandardTokenModified.sol#216-218)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
StandardTokenModified.decimals should be constant (StandardTokenModified.sol#95)
StandardTokenModified.name should be constant (StandardTokenModified.sol#93)
StandardTokenModified.symbol should be constant (StandardTokenModified.sol#94)
StandardTokenModified.totalSupply_ should be constant (StandardTokenModified.sol#92)
StandardTokenModified.transfersFrozen should be constant (StandardTokenModified.sol#96)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: ERC20Basic.totalSupply (StandardTokenModified.sol#12) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:

vulnerability_findings.message: StandardTokenModified.totalSupply (StandardTokenModified.sol#216-218) should be declared external
